bug.author: Yangxiaojun1230
bug.description: I run in a conda env just setup follow the step. And installed labelme successfully. But when i run labelme, it occured error: [INFO] Loading config file from: /home/yangjeff/.labelmerc (init.py:73) Cannot mix incompatible Qt library (version 0x50907) with this library (version 0x50905) Aborted (core dumped) Do anyone could help me. The system is ubuntu16.04

comments.comment:
The CI is working perfectly with Conda on Ubuntu 16.04. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/wkentaro/labelme/actions?query=workflow%3Aci>https://github.com/wkentaro/labelme/actions?query=workflow%3Aci</denchmark-link>
Maybe you have something wrong in the apt installed libraries.

I run in a conda env just setup follow the step. And installed labelme successfully. But when i run labelme, it occured error: [INFO] Loading config file from: /home/yangjeff/.labelmerc (init.py:73) Cannot mix incompatible Qt library (version 0x50907) with this library (version 0x50905) Aborted (core dumped) Do anyone could help me. The system is ubuntu16.04
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Yangxiaojun1230>@Yangxiaojun1230</denchmark-link>
I have the same problem. Could you fix it?
At last i fix it by reinstall conda env, it's wrong with my env since i use same version python with host.
